Long Description:
What it is: A lightly-foaming cleanser that removes makeup and dirt, helping to reduce blackheads, acne, and blemishes while unclogging pores.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Oiliness, Pores, and Acne and Blemishes

Formulation: Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Salicylic Acid 2%: Helps to gently exfoliate the skin and unclogs the pores by dislodging dead skin cells.
- Zinc Compound: Helps reduce excess sebum and has anti-inflammatory properties.
- Allantoin 0.5%: Helps soothe irritation and stimulates growth of healthy skin tissue.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is also cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Not only working to effectively cleanse the skin, this two percent Salicylic Acid Cleanser has an added zinc compound. The two work together to help with oil-control, reduce blackheads and breakouts, and promote a more even-looking complexion.

Long Description:
What it is: A PH-neutral, daily cream cleanser that gently washes away impurities without stripping skin—leaving it hydrated, feeling soft, and looking luminous.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination

Skincare Concerns: Dryness

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Blend of Japanese Algae: Leaves skin feeling soft, comforted, and nourished.
- Hyaluronic Acid: Helps skin look smooth and plump with hydration.
- Tatcha‘s Signature Hadasei-3: Restores a visibly healthy-, youthful-looking radiance.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: For centuries, Japanese women have repurposed the milky water leftover from rinsing rice for cooking to use in their beauty rituals. A rich source of vitamins A, B2, B12, and E, this byproduct softens and boosts the look of luminosity. This original cleansing ritual was the inspiration for this wash, combining Okinawa red algae and hyaluronic acid with Japanese rice powder to replenish essential moisture for clean, hydrated skin.

Every Tatcha purchase supports equality in education through their Beautiful Faces, Beautiful Futures program.

Clinical Results: Based on an expert grader survey of 25 subjects over a 4-week period:
- +39% average boost in skin hydration was measured.

Based on a self-assessment of 25 subjects over a 4-week period:
- 92% felt skin was healthy-looking and felt softer
- 96% felt skin was balanced

Highlights: Vegan; Community Favorite; Clean at Sephora; Fragrance Free; Without Sulfates SLS & SLES; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
What it is: A gentle cleanser to remove makeup, excess oil, pollution, and grime that rinses away without residue, leaving skin clean and soft.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Redness


Formulation: Lightweight Gel


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Mild Surfactant Blend: A stack of mild cleansing agents, including coconut-based surfactants rich in fatty acids that work together to create a gentle lather that effectively dissolves even stubborn makeup, sunscreen, and oils while supporting a healthy-looking skin barrier.

- Glycerin: A skin-identical humectant that replenishes hydration levels normally lost during the cleansing process.

- Cantaloupe Fruit Extract: Rich in antioxidants, this extract soothes and hydrates.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: With a unique blend of mild surfactants and makeup-dissolving emollients, this gentle cleanser is formulated at an ideal, non-stripping pH level of 5.5. Free of SLS, fragrance, essential oils, and silicones, Beste™ No. 9 is appropriate for all skin.


Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.


Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.


Clinical Results:

In a consumer-perception study with 106 people after 1 day:

-99% agreed skin felt free of impurities and surface debris

-97% agreed Beste was non-irritating to skin

-93% agreed skin felt balanced, soft, and supple

Product Name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser
Highlights: allure 2020 Best of Beauty Award Winner ; Good for: Pores ; Clean at Sephora; Oil Free; Best for Oily, Combo, Normal Skin
Long Description:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A daily gel cleanser with natural fruit exfoliant that thoroughly but gently lifts impurities and unclogs pores while leaving skin soft and hydrated.

Solutions for:
- Pores
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Oiliness

If you want to know more…
The Deep Cleanse oil-free gel lathers into a creamy foam to lift away dirt, oil, and impurities without over-drying. It cleanses with amino acids derived from silk gentle enough for even the most delicate skin, leaving skin soft, refreshed, and comfortably hydrated.

The formula harnesses the power of the Japanese luffa fruit, a natural beauty multitasker beloved by Japanese women for centuries. Ground fibers from the fruit exfoliate, helping to turn over dead skin cells while purifying and decongesting pores. The fruit extract also beautifies and conditions skin. Japanese wild rose works to visibly tighten pores and smooth skin texture, while Japanese leopard lily helps minimize excess oil.

What else you need to know:
Harvested under a full autumn moon, the water of luffa fruit has been prized as a favorite natural skincare ingredient in Japan since the Edo period. It is beloved for its clarifying and moisturizing properties. When dried and ground, the fruit gently exfoliates to purify and smooth skin texture—the original inspiration for the modern day loofah sponge. The Deep Cleanse harnesses this time-tested ingredient in this refreshing, easy-to-use daily exfoliating cleanser.

This pure, oil-free formula is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, of TEA.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

Long Description:
What it is: A gentle rice-based powder cleanser that exfoliates skin while visibly brightening, smoothing texture, and clearing clogged pores.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Papain Enzymes and Salicylic Acid: Draw out excess oil, clear clogged pores, and smooth the skin.
- Rice Bran-Derived Phytic Acid: Gently exfoliates to visibly brighten and balance uneven skin tone.
- Colloidal Oatmeal: Calms skin, reducing the appearance of redness and irritation.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Gentle enough for daily use, this powder cleanser exfoliates with unique visibly brightening enzymes (without overprocessing your skin). Activated by water, it transforms into a foaming, creamy paste, releasing papain and salicylic acid to minimize the appearance of blackheads, uneven texture, and hyperpigmentation.
Ingredients:
-Papain Enzymes and Salicylic Acid: Draw out excess oil, clear clogged pores, and smooth the look of skin.

-Rice Bran-Derived Phytic Acid: Gently exfoliates to visibly brighten and balance uneven skin tone.

Product Name: Find Your Balance™ Oil Control Cleanser
Highlights: Good for: Acne/Blemishes; Good for: Pores ; AHA/Glycolic Acid; Lactic Acid; Without Parabens ; Vegan
Long Description:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Oily
✔ Combination

What it is:
A pore-purifying cleanser with powerful AHAs to reduce excess oil and unclog pores, without stripping skin.

Solutions for:
- Oiliness
- Pores
- Acne and blemishes

If you want to know more…
Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser reduces excess oil and deeply cleanses pores. Formulated with Green Fusion Complex™ and neem seed oil, its deep cleansing action helps unclog and purify pores without stripping skin, while the invigorating eucalyptus scent awakens the senses. Powerful AHAs—glycolic and lactic acids—help loosen and lift dead skin cells that can cause pore-clogging build-up. Instantly, the complexion is refreshed and balanced with a healthy-looking glow.

What else you need to know:
During his own struggle with cystic acne, Ole had firsthand experience with harsh oil control cleansers that left skin feeling stripped. He wanted to create an alternative that is a joy to use. This cleanser features OleHenriksen’s Green Fusion Complex™, a proprietary blend of potent active botanicals—including green tea, eucalyptus, algae (kelp), and Irish moss extracts—with natural antiseptic properties to help absorb excess oil and refine pores.

This product is noncomedogenic.

Research results:
In an independent consumer study on 36 women after 1 week:
- 100% said it removes oil
- 100% said it refreshes skin
- 97% said it creates healthier-looking skin
- 97% said it improves skin quality
- 94% said it mattifies skin
- 94% said it controls excess oil
- 94% said it restores skin’s balance

Highlights: Vegan; Clean at Sephora; Good for: Dryness; Fragrance Free; Cruelty-Free
Long Description:
What it is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness

Formulation: Lightweight Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Micellar Cleansing Blend: A mix of ultra-gentle, dirt- and pollution-capturing surfactants and emollients.
- 3-Ceramide Blend: Ceramides AP, NP, and EOP are derived from plant sources and are identical to the wax-like moisturizing ceramides that occur naturally in skin and help
soothe and maintain the moisture balance of skin while protecting against water loss. Ceramides help fill in the spaces between skin cells, giving them the appearance of elasticity and playing a critical role in supporting the skin barrier.
- Wild Melon Seed Oil: Cold pressed and rich in omega 6 and 9 fatty acids (linoleic and oleic) as well as antioxidant polyphenols, it‘s used for its soothing, moisturizing, and barrier-supportive benefits.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: With ultra-mild micelles, replenishing fatty acids, and antioxidant-rich plant oils, E-Rase™ nourishes skin while dissolving away makeup and dirt, is barrier-supportive, and may be used anytime you need a quick skin refreshment. E-Rase™ is gentle enough to be used all over, including eyes and lips, and is formulated at a pH of 5.0.

This micellar water is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This liquid facial soap cleanses with a soft, non-drying lather to loosen surface flakes, removes dirt and debris, and protects skin’s natural moisture balance. The quick-rinsing formula leaves skin clean, comfortable, refreshed, and never taut or dry. It also preps skin for the exfoliating action of Step Two, Clarifying Lotion.

Clinique’s formulas: No parabens. No phthalates. No fragrance. Just happy skin.
Clinique’s packaging: Same great formula, now in more sustainable packaging. Bottle is 96 percent plant-derived plastic. Cap is 25 percent post-consumer recycled material.
• What does plant-derived plastic mean? It's made from an agricultural byproduct of processing sugarcane that would otherwise be discarded.
• What does post-consumer recycled (PCR) material mean? It’s a material (such as a plastic water bottle) that's already been used and would otherwise have been thrown away. This reduces the creation of new plastic waste.​

Please note: In an effort to minimize waste, Clinique’s first selling through all of its cleansers with the original packaging. That's why you might not receive the newest packaging, but rest assured it’s the same great formula inside. ​
Ingredients:
-Sucrose: Calms and soothes.

Long Description:
What it is:
An ultramoisturizing, pearlized wash that gently exfoliates to restore radiance and protect skin’s natural moisture barrier.

What it is formulated to do:
Renewing Cleansing Cream is a highly-concentrated, ultramoisturizing cleanser formulated to rejuvenate and rebalance hormonally aging skin. Papaya enzymes provide non-abrasive exfoliation while algae extract hydrates, soothes, and firms skin. Apricot and starflower oils work to provide intense hydration and improve skin resilience while essential fatty acids help maintain skin’s barrier function. Renewing Cleansing Cream is recommended as a step one cleanser in any Murad resurgence regimen and restores skin’s youthful glow as part of Dr. Murad’s Inclusive Health® system of care.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
RepleniCell™, Murad’s patent-pending, proprietary technology, helps skin act younger in three ways: it helps skin attract water; it binds water to the skin; and it helps skin retain water. This product is dermatologist developed, scientifically proven, and is not tested on animals.

Research results:
In a Murad Inclusive Health Center® study, after using Resurgence for 30 days:
- 98% of women saw an improvement in the overall health of their skin
- 100% of women reported they were more hydrated
- 96% of women reported that their skin looked and felt firmer
- 93.9% of women saw a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
- 94% of women reported that their pores appear to be smaller and less visible
- 88% of women reported their skin looked and felt significantly smoother

Regimen consisted of Renewing Cleansing Cream, Age-Diffusing Serum, Sheer Lustre Day Moisture SPF 15 | PA+++ and Age-Balancing Night Cream. Individual results will vary. Study results on file.

-Essential Fatty Acids: Help maintain skin’s barrier function.

Long Description:
What it is:
A luxurious, antiaging facial cleansing gel that provides an exhilarating, peachy clean freshness to help produce a beautiful, fresh, youthful-looking complexion.

What it is formulated to do:
Oil-free, anti-wrinkle technology helps to rejuvenate, clarify, and brighten with glycolic acid, salicylic acid, extracts of peach, white oak bark, lemon, lime, linden, grapefruit, and arginine. An advanced deep pore resurfacing action supports natural cell turnover to help diminish the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and other signs of aging. It helps to effectively detoxify the pores, dissolve makeup, emulsify oil, and improve skin texture as it gently sweeps away dead skin cells and impurities that can make the complexion appear more dull. Ideal for all skin types except sensitive skin, including dry, sun damaged, normal, combination, oily, and acne prone skin, this gel produces an ultraclean, refined, and revitalized complexion.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Phthalates

Research results:
In a 4-week consumer efficacy study on 25 women:
- 96% agreed their skin appeared brighter
- 92% agreed they appeared more youthful
- 88% agreed this product delivered antiaging benefits
Ingredients:
-1% Glycolic Acid (AHA): Exfoliates surface dead skin cells and stimulates cellular turnover.
-1% Salicylic Acid (BHA): Helps to loosen sebum within the pores and prevents future breakouts.
-Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5): Moisturizes, nourishes, and clarifies.
-Lemon, Lime, and Grapefruit Extracts: Brighten.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Prebiotic Inulin: A plant-based extract derived from chicory roots that is food for the skin’s microbiota to keep it balanced and better able to defend against external aggressors that can contribute to skin appearing dehydrated and rough with visible pores.
- Kombucha: Fermented black tea rich in antioxidants that visibly smooths, increases luminosity, and defends against oxidative stress caused by pollution, which can contribute to premature fine lines and a dull, fragile complexion.

What Else You Need to Know: This no-rinse cleanser visibly sweeps away impurities, makeup, sunscreen, and pollution while refining the look of pores. It feeds skin’s microbiota with prebiotic inulin to keep skin balanced and fight dullness and dehydration. Powered by antioxidant kombucha, use it as your primary cleanser or as the second step in double cleansing for full makeup days.

Clinical Results: In a self-assessment of 61 subjects, after 4 weeks of using the cleanser, results included:
- 100% felt it cleansed and eliminated pollution and impurities
- 100% agreed skin clarity was improved

In an instrumental test on 20 subjects:
- 12% reduction in the look of pores was measured after 4 weeks

If you want to know more…
SK-II’s bestselling Facial Treatment Cleanser is formulated to provide a gentle, ultra-hydrating wash, leaving skin comfortably conditioned and velvety smooth. The creamy formula lathers on with a fine texture, and then bubbles into a luxurious cleansing foam, purifying and moisturizing the skin.

This facial cleanser is a highly effective makeup remover, and is infused with concentrated Pitera™—SK-II’s exclusive active ingredient rich in vitamins, organic acids, minerals, and amino acids—as well as white willow extract to effectively remove embedded impurities around and inside pores, leaving skin feeling clean and fresh.

What else you need to know:
Double cleansing is a unique Asian beauty skincare practice that is quickly gaining popularity in the Western world. This two-step process is the most effective way to completely wash your face of all impurities, and is key to getting the most out of your skincare routine. Start with an oil-based cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil (sold separately), to lift away all impurities on the skin’s surface. Follow with a cream or foam cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleanser, to remove any additional dirt, oil, and dead skin cells.

This product is fragrance-free and colorant-free. It contains no petrochemicals, and is not tested on animals.
Ingredients:

-Rose Scent: Moisturizes and relaxes.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Blueberry Extract: A potent antioxidant with soothing and antiglycation properties.
- Virgin Marula Oil: A super-absorbable oil—high in critical antioxidants and omega-6 and -9—that nourishes and visibly rejuvenates the skin.
- Honey: Has antioxidant properties and soothes and nourishes the skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Infused with blueberry extract, marula oil, and honey, Pekee™ Cleansing Bar visibly tones and promotes moisture retention for skin that feels firmer and more elastic. It is free of fragrance, essential oils, silicones, and soap and has an ideal pH level of 6.5 to cleanse and calm without drying or stripping the skin of its protective barrier.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Infused with thermal mud, marula, bamboo, and superfruit, Juju dissolves pore-clogging, excess oil, surface debris, and impurities while gently exfoliating for softer, smoother skin with visibly improved clarity. This bar is free of fragrance, essential oils, soap, and silicones and has a pH level of 6.3 to cleanse without drying or stripping.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Long Description:
What it is:
A lathering facial wash that gently cleanses and removes makeup without drying skin.

What it is formulated to do:
This deep-acting daily facial wash gently cleanses the skin without irritation or dryness, removing impurities and makeup for revived, radiant, and younger-looking skin. Alguronic acid, a microalgae-derived ingredient and antiaging powerhouse, provides unique and powerful regenerative skin care properties.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
While pursuing renewable energy solutions, a biotechnology laboratory in San Francisco unexpectedly discovered the powerful regenerative properties of alguronic acid. Exclusive to Algenist, this remarkable ingredient is now available in skin care products.

Research results:
In comparison testing, alguronic acid outperformed other well-known active antiaging ingredients, demonstrating superior antiaging benefits. Average results measured following an in-vitro test with alguronic acid:
- 55% increase in cellular regeneration
- 32% increase in elastin synthesis
- 26% decrease in melanin production

Results obtained using product twice daily, following a self-assessment of 100 women:
Within 10 days of use:
- 91% saw revived skin
- 97% saw softer, smoother skin

What it is:
A detoxifying cleansing oil with deeply penetrating actives to dissolve trapped oils, impurities, and makeup on contact.

Solutions for:
- Pores
- Acne and blemishes
- Oiliness

If you want to know more…
The lightweight Detoxifying Cleansing Oil deeply cleanses to dissolve surface impurities and makeup, even reducing the look of large pores—without leaving skin feeling tight or dry. Its unique blend fights toxins and promotes natural skin exfoliation, cell turnover, and circulation to create a visibly clearer, more balanced, and soothed complexion. Erno Laszlo’s innovative cleansing technology transforms the cleansing oil from black to white on contact, where charcoal, a powerhouse cleansing agent, acts like a magnet to draw out and trap impurities. Brimming with sea water and grapeseed oil, the formula delivers energizing minerals to combat everyday buildup for a restored, healthier, and younger-looking complexion.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is formulated without mineral oil, petrolatum, urea, and colorants. It is safe for all skin types, noncomedogenic, and non-irritating.
Ingredients:
-Grapeseed Oil: Defies pore-clogging toxins and bacteria by visibly tightening skin and pores while delivering hydration, antioxidants, vitamins, and essential fatty acids and promoting natural oil regulation.
-Sea Water: Exfoliates and promotes skin’s natural toxin removal, cell turnover, and circulation, while fighting pore-clogging residue and delivering magnesium for visibly soothed skin.
-Shea Butter: Softens and keeps skin supple as an ancient remedy rich in vitamins and fatty acids for nourished, water-retained, protected skin with visibly soothed inflammation.
